backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor defining workout schedule, motivational message, user profile, and tier types with CRUD operations, access control via role-based authorization, and tier progression logic.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that upgrades WorkoutSchedule records from the old schema (no setRows) to the new schema by adding an empty setRows array to each entry.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (set-row UI on Schedule, checklist on TodaysWorkout, React Query hooks for set-row operations) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated documentation file containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file for build planning and reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark modes including background, foreground, primary, muted, chart, and sidebar color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Daily Grind PWA, linking the manifest, setting theme color and Apple PWA meta tags, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Daily Grind specifying standalone display, dark background, orange theme color, and a single 256Ã—256 app icon.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service Worker that schedules 4-hour periodic workout reminder push notifications with random motivational quotes and handles START/STOP/TEST messages and notification click events.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining five routes (/, /today, /schedule, /progress, /settings) wrapped in a RootLayout that applies ThemeProvider, AppLayout, and registers the service worker on mount.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main application shell with a sticky header, desktop nav bar, and mobile bottom nav, showing navigation links only when the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Wraps protected routes to show a loading spinner, login screen, or profile setup modal depending on authentication and profile fetch state.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and clears the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays a centered landing/login page with the app logo, feature highlights, and the LoginButton for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a display name and notification preference from new users and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/TierBadge.tsx: Defines 22 ranked tiers with associated styles and exports a TierBadge component that renders a styled badge in compact or full variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context provider and hook, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout state, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Custom React hook that manages browser push notification state, syncing enabled/disabled status with the backend user profile and exposing methods to enable, disable, and test notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations including fetching/mutating workout schedules, user profiles, motivational messages, and tier evaluation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark mode color themes with fitness-oriented styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClient, InternetIdentity authentication, and the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Progress.tsx: Progress page that displays weekly workout stats, streak count, and a day-by-day completion grid derived from the user's workout schedules, with tier badge and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/Schedule.tsx: Schedule page that renders a weekly workout planner allowing users to create, edit, and delete per-day workout entries with structured set rows and time reminders.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page that exposes tier progression evaluation and push notification toggle controls, displaying current tier info and workout completion progress.
frontend/src/pages/TodaysWorkout.tsx: React page that displays the current day's workout schedule, allows marking individual set rows and the full workout as complete, and shows a refreshable motivational message banner.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Utility module for registering a service worker and managing push notification permissions and scheduling by sending messages (START, STOP, TEST) to the active service worker.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark fitness-themed design system with OKLCH color tokens, custom fonts (Inter, Barlow Condensed), glow shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the 'Daily Grind' workout reminder app's architecture, existing features, known issues, and versioning metadata for build planning.
